Wessalen was the prelate or leader of the Order of the Radiant Heart in the Amnian city of Athkatla during the midâ€“14 century DR.
As part of his duties to the orders chapterhouse, Prelate Wessalen would preside over the judgement and induction of new knights that had completed their careers as squires.
Wessalen had taken a knight aspiring knight named Cathras to be his squire.
